quote: As one grows weaker one is less susceptible to suffering. There is less hurt because there is less to hurt. – Jack London
fact: The characters Bert and Ernie on Sesame Street were named after Bert the cop and Ernie the taxi driver in Frank Capra`s "Its A Wonderful Life."
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: How did the hipster burn the roof of his mouth? He ate the pizza before it was cool.
